alert.note: Alert for Atoka (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 09 at 8:05AM CDT until June 10 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Norman OK has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Clear Boggy Creek near Caney affecting Atoka County.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. OKC005-100115- /O.NEW.KOUN.FL.W.0012.220609T1305Z-220610T0600Z/ /CANO2.1.ER.220609T1300Z.220609T1800Z.220610T0000Z.NO/ 805 AM CDT Thu Jun 9 2022 ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... ...REPLACES RIVER FLOOD ADVISORY... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Clear Boggy Creek near Caney. * WHEN...From this morning to just after midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...At 26.0 feet, The creek reaches bankfull levels in western Atoka County and the northeastern edge of Bryan County. High stages on small feeder streams could further result in greater-than-bankfull overflows to mainstem bottomlands. Croplands... pastures... and some secondary rural roads along and near Clear Boggy Creek are affected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 26.0 feet. - Forecast...The Clear Boggy Creek is expected to rise to a crest of 26.3 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage this evening. - Flood stage is 26.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
